definition: فحش faḥuša u (fuḥš) to be monstrous; to be excessive, exorbitant; to be detestable, abominable, atrocious, obscene, indecent, foul, shameless, impudent IV to use obscene language; to commit atrocities VI = I and IV فحش fuḥš monstrosity; abominableness, atrocity; obscenity, indecency; obscene language
